name: BroShield® 8408
description: BroShield® 8408 is a flame retardant and plasticizer for plastics and elastomers, particularly PVC. This halogenated product offers good thermal stability and cost-effective performance. Its clear liquid form makes it easy to work with, especially in film applications. Certified under CERCLA, SARA 313, Clean Water Act (CWA), and California Proposition 65.
